titles.title: A bill to withdraw the Los Padres National Forest in California from location, entry, and patent under mining laws, and for other purposes.
A bill to withdraw the Los Padres National Forest in California from location, entry, and patent under mining laws, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Withdraws the Los Padres National Forest in California from: (1) all forms of entry, appropriation, and disposal under the public land laws; (2) location, entry, and patent under the mining laws; and (3) operation of the mineral leasing, mineral materials, and geothermal leasing laws.
